title: Angel "Tweets": Communing With Angels In Today's World
description: Angels "Tweets" describes a new approach for communing with the Angelic Kingdom within our modern world of electronics and technology. Mankind has 'stepped up the pace' of his development - and so have other Kingdoms of the Earth - including the one we call the Angelic Kingdom. Angels are not just Biblical messengers - they are workers and can be contacted by expansion of one's mind and heart. It is a matter of 'frequency' not only devotion.
author: + Michelina T Foster
